name: Motor Bike Stunt: Crazy Flying
description:
Get ready for ultimate moto bike climb & drive on sky roads at hight like hill by playing this motorbike Simulator game of 2017. Be a furious driver of motor bike and do drifting and crashing in this auto action packed bike game with killer deadly stunts. The rolling fans are also flying in the air to destroy your luxury motor bikes; you need to race fast your heavy bike and drift bike to avoid the crash. Avoid impossible fall to become the legend of biking by completing all the challenging and thrilling missions on sky roads and tracks.

Features:
- Real life moto biking experience with 50 different missions
- Mid-air stunts and sky high driving tracks
- Sports bike with real stunt bike inside in impossible tracks games.
- Extreme bike stunts and realistic bike driving simulation
- 7 different types of sports bikes
- Amazing tracks dangerous sharp turns with jumps and obstacles
